timeline.bodyText:
@genryxy right now it is not really clear what this method returns. Does it trims name and return the extension or does it trim extension or return the name? Method name is trimExtension yet comment states "Trim name". This is misleading.
I'd suggest to split the method into two: isYaml for filtering files and name that returns String without extension (or full name if it has no extension). I think it would be easier to understand this way.
